content: Is there a way to generate the triage report but say “hey, do it but leave this set of specified benchmarks out of it this time” ?

In my specific case, I’m finishing up the report for this week and have basically decided that all the instances of inflate going up or down by 5%/6% for incr-unchanged are spurious. I’d love to just cut them out of the report, but I don’t want to remove the entries for PRs where some other benchmark would have been flagged otherwise. (I’ve tried to do it by hand, to some extent.)

It feels like the "significant change" detection should do this automatically? Like, it should recognize that 5-6% variations for that benchmark are common recently, and so it shouldn't flag any change of that magnitude as significant.

I guess I’m just figuring that there are going to be unexpected cases where people will want to quickly see the results of “what if” scenarios, rather than try to assume we are going to ever get the perfect “significance” heuristic into place
